mapper.select: /* 자격증 조회 */ SELECT user_certificate_code, user_id, user_certificate_name, user_certificate_publication, user_certificate_date, profile_reg_date, profile_hidden, profile_application_hidden FROM profile_certificate WHERE user_id = #{sessionId};
mapper.insert:
/* 자동증가코드 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'user_certificate_code001' WHEN CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(user_certificate_code, '_code', -1) AS UNSIGNED) < 999 THEN CONCAT('user_certificate_code', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(user_certificate_code, '_code', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1, 3, '0')) ELSE CONCAT('user_certificate_code', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(user_certificate_code, '_code', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS newCertificateCode FROM profile_certificate;
/* 자격증 등록 */ INSERT INTO profile_certificate (user_certificate_code, user_id, user_certificate_name, user_certificate_publication, user_certificate_date, profile_hidden, profile_application_hidden) VALUES (#{certificateCode}, #{userId}, #{certificateName}, #{certificatePublication}, #{certificateDate}, ${profileHidden}, ${profileApplicationHidden})
mapper.select: /* 자격증 코드별 자격증 조회 */ SELECT user_certificate_code, user_id, user_certificate_name, user_certificate_publication, user_certificate_date, profile_hidden, profile_application_hidden FROM profile_certificate WHERE user_certificate_code = #{certificateCode};
